testcase.name: BeforeStories
Given the user is on the Wikionary home page
When the user looks up the definition of the word 'apple'
Then they should see the definition 'A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.'
Scenario: Looking up the definition of 'apple'
testcase.classname: Scenario: Looking up the definition of 'apple'

testcase.name: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page​
When the user looks up the definition of the word 'pear'
Then they should see the definition 'An edible fruit produced by the pear tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem.'
Scenario: Looking up the definition of 'pear'
testcase.classname: Scenario: Looking up the definition of 'pear'

testcase.name: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page​​
When the user looks up the definition of the word 'peach'
Then they should see the definition 'An edible fruit produced by the peach tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem.'

failure.message: Expected: a collection containing a string containing "An edible fruit produced by the peach tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem." but: was "A tree (Prunus persica), native to China and now widely cultivated throughout temperate regions, having pink flowers and edible fruit.", was "The soft juicy stone fruit of the peach tree, having yellow flesh, downy, red-tinted yellow skin, and a deeply sculptured pit or stone containing a single seed. [quotations ▼]", was "", was "A light moderate to strong yellowish pink to light orange color. peach colour: ", was "(informal) A particularly admirable or pleasing person or thing. [quotations ▼]", was "", was "The large, edible berry of the Sarcocephalus esculentus, a rubiaceous climbing shrub of west tropical Africa."
